name: Smadreland Simulator 2018 (Hottieman)
description:
The official winner of the KMD Copenhell gamejam!

Is Smadreland not enough for you? Come try Smadreland Simulator this year at Copenhell. Explosions, guitar smashing and much more, it's the power to destroy much more!

You need controllers to play the game, 2-4 players.
